Articles.Content:
Not life size but yes

the user below me wish they could get Ã¢Ë†Å¾ ÃŽâ€ v in ksp without cheats

um.. nope. but I can get A LOT.

the user below m- NULLPOINTEREXCEPTION : object referance not set to a target

(back up question : the use below me can nake his game crash without NRE on stock.

I tried molding every danny2462 creation EVER into one object. It had kerbal landing legs, the decoupler whip, etc.

It crashed my computer within 5 seconds after launch.

TUBM likes xkcd.

Very much, and have talked to the author about KSP.

The user below me is a good cook.

Eh, I don't cook that often, but I can cook fairly well.

The user below me likes waffles.

Leggo my eggo!

TUBM has heard of axe cop.

False. No bells ringing.

The user below me likes to build replica models in KSP

nnnoooooooo... I DO NOT like replicas!!!

TUBM like to annoy modpack creators due to bugs.

Nope... with all the updates to KSP pending... I feel sorry for modpack creators!

TUBM doesn't eat jalapeno salsa sauce on their scrambled eggs.

True?

TUBM has been to wallops island.

True, but I barely remember it.

TUBM has KSP bought on steam!

nope. I bought KSP long before it was on Steam, and then had my copy transferred to Steam. So even though I have KSP on Steam, I never actually purchased it there.

TUBM also has a copy of KSP on Steam which was transfered over from the KSP website.

Nada

tubm prefers snail mail

I prefer email.

TUBM is addicted to civ 5.

No, got it in the last Steam sale and have hardly played it. (Dammit, KSP, I have other games to play!)

The user below me never pays full price for games.

FALSE AND MY WALLET HURTS

tubm is from Central Europe

No,

The user below me is feeling depressed.

Not at the moment. Feeling more neutral with a content tone at the moment. Got through the severe depression already.

TUBM reads Eve Order Zero.

Not hardly. Re-reading Azimov's Foundation series.

TUBM only wants pepperoni and cheese on their pizza...

No, everything but anchovies and pineapple is fair game. (Azimov? Surely you mean Asimov.)

The user below me likes cheese and bacon on burgers.

Not so sure about cheese, but bacon is always welcome on my burger.

The user below me has experienced burns of a second degree or higher.

Yes placed my knee on the side of a metal fire pit I didn't notice or feel it in till someone pointed it out because I was trying to make the perfect marshmallows

tubm didnt read read all of that

True (punctuation helps)

The user below me has watched at least one of my YouTube videos.

Never, at least not yet.

TUBM reads Isaac Asimov.

False, Who is he?!

TUBM has took a IQ test
